summary: REQ-16 appears implemented: backend/main.mo now defines ADMIN_EMAIL as "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com" and isAllowlistedAdmin compares stored user email against that constant. An additional, non-requested metadata change was made to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/summary text to mention the admin email allowlist value.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to change the backend allowlisted admin email constant/authorization behavior in backend/main.mo and did not request any project_state.json edits.
